explains: n. 口号，标语；广告语；<史>苏格兰高地的战斗呐喊

sentences.en: The Republicans tried to trump this with their slogan.
sentences.cn: 共和党人试图用他们的口号来胜出。

sentences.en: The ceremony was disrupted by unprecedented heckling and slogan-chanting.
sentences.cn: 典礼因前所未有的起哄和口号声而中断。

sentences.en: "the survival of the fittest," a slogan that virtually preempted all debate.
sentences.cn: “适者生存”，一个几乎无可辩驳的口号。
